derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 19th cent.: from French thalassique, from Greek thalassa 'sea'

means.word_mean: 1. relating to the seas, especially smaller or inland seas;

sentences.sentence: "deposits of sediment in gulfs and seas rather than in the ocean proper are known as thalassic deposits"- Scientific American
